leaflet.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a small book or piece of paper advertising something or giving information on a particular subject
leaflet.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Students were handing out election leaflets at the station.
leaflet.translation[2].definitions[0].de: a small piece of printed paper that gives information or advertises something
leaflet.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: An explanatory leaflet is available from tax offices.
